_xResult.title: Out and About Coat
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made cotton coat with red and grey patterned embroidery
_xResult.longdesc:
The Etno coat has been a staple style for decades thanks to the classic elegant cut, narrow waist and slightly flared bottom. This made to measure Etno coat is perfect for spring and fall days when the weather is still cool. This piece is made of embroidered cotton cloth with a smooth and velvety lining and decorated with a coat of arms in traditional Romanian style. This coat would be great over an elegant daytime outfit, or a spotlight stealer at special events.


You need a coat made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
